website_summaries.verdict: Casual athletic styling combined with pure right-off-the-box comfort makes for pretty amazing kicks. But that’s not all these Merrell Range AC+ shoes are about. They’re also lightweight enough to be worn all day, supportive and stable, and durable. Best of all, they come in terrific color schemes.The laces can be frustrating as they keep getting untied unless you do double loops. The fabric of the shoes also has a tendency to snag on the socks. However, if you do an advantage vs. disadvantage list,  you’ll find that the pros greatly outweigh the cons.
pros: According to many Merrell Range AC+ reviews, the shoes’ soft and stretchy fabric gives an incredibly comfortable feel
These sneakers by Merrell need no breaking in, according to a handful of purchasers
These lifestyle sneakers provide ample support, several testers have noted
A small number of consumers are happy with how light these Merrell shoes weigh
A few individuals are pleasantly surprised at how sturdy these kicks seem to be
The Merrell Range AC+ colors are “amazing,” users say, and they also stay bright even after tons of wear
The modern casual styling of these low-top sneakers by Merrell is commended by some reviewers
Several buyers have stated that the shoes are extremely versatile and are perfect for jogging, working out in, wearing about town, or just lazing about in for the rest of the day
cons: Some are unhappy that the laces of the Merrell Range AC+ shoes won’t stay tied
One person has noted that the soft fabric upper on top tends to hold on to socks and pull them down

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, couldn’t be happier with them!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because I like the way they looked. But now I’d say I like them even better because of the fit. I wear a 11 in most other brands and these fit perfect. I have a high arch and these have some of the best arch support of any other brand. If your looking for an alternative to Nike, adidas or new balance these are your shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C.

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: I love merrells. They generally have a great foot print for hikers. Ive owned sever pairs of merrells in the last few years. These are more athletically shaped and narrow with high arches. I have a relatively flat foot. One or two hikes in these would completely blow out the sides. Im returning them. They seem great and comfortable shoes. They just arent meant for wide footprints
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Myers

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: I want to wear this shoe every day because it's so damn comfortable. I don't want to wear them out too quickly though. These are the only shoes I've ever owned that I can wear all day without ever even thinking about taking them off to give my feet a break. I will be buying several more as I can afford them.
customer_reviews.author: Manny O

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Given the mix of reviews, I didn't know what to expect. However, I learned that the more people don't like the fit of a Merrell shoe/boot (high arch, narrow heel, too week in toe box,, etc), the better the chances that it will fit me just fine. Such is the case with these. I only give these four stars because useless I lace them just so the top of my right foot (medial marginal vein) will complain that the laces are cutting off the circulation. Other than that bit of tying finesse, I do like these shoes and they will stay in rotation among its Merrell stablemates.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Walk, walk, walk
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoe I have ever owned. I fly over 100,000 miles a year for work and also spend lots of time traveling for pleasure and these shoes make the miles even more enjoyable. I can walk all day in them and my feet don’t ache. Highly recommend. In my experience they were a bit smaller than I’m used to. So I ordered the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Marie Beal

customer_reviews.title: Very Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow shoes in the ball of your feet. The shoe felt extremely comfortable(hence the 3 star) but the inside ball of my foot was constantly stretched over the edge of the shoe. I am guessing the main culprit is the upper shoe is made of a flexible material, so it wasn't held securely on place.
customer_reviews.author: Swan

customer_reviews.title: Boot-like support / Athletic look and weight
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic support and cushion with a thick heel make your walking posture and stability boot-like (a huge advantage for distances). The look is athletic and certainly more stylish than most hiking shoes (e.g. typical Merrell’s, Keen’s etc.) Extremely light weight and flexible for maximum comfort (without sacrificing posture and support). Highly recommended, worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe but fit was a little off
customer_reviews.text: I have had many pairs of Merrell's and have loved each pair I have owned. However this model seemed like it was narrow compared to previous models. The shoe material is stretchy, which allowed you foot to move around a lot more than normal, I did not like this aspect of the shoe either. Build quality was as expected for a pair of Merrell's, unfortunately I did decide to return this model.
customer_reviews.author: William R.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than other sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look and light weight feeling of these sneakers. I usually wear a men's size 11 with most shoes so that's what I ordered. The right sneaker however felt too narrow and pinched my pinky toe which made that shoe painful after a few hours of trail walking. Thank goodness I had an extra pair of sneakers to wear. I wanted to exchange for a larger size but the price was 4 times more expensive so I returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Met11756

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes yet.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They're lightweight and the fit is unsurpassed. The elastic laces are perfect and there's even a sewn in pocket to tuck them in. They handle light jogging and bicycling without a problem and they're understated enough to wear as casual sneakers. I have them on right now for now reason, jus' 'cause I like'em. Merrel's the bomb. I've never had a bad pair and these are no exception. They're just what I was hopin' for. Get'em.
customer_reviews.author: Crunchy Sock

customer_reviews.title: A must purchase for Merrel shoes
customer_reviews.text: Wow, the most comfortable shoe I have ever owned. Fit great right out of the box. Highly recommended!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy B. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy, but will it last?
customer_reviews.text: Getting in through the small opening is more difficult than getting out of the shoes. These are very comfy shoes. These kind of "sock" shoes seem to be made entirely of elastic, but I wonder how long will this elastic last?
customer_reviews.author: Sabine A.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and durable: perfect for city walking to trail hiking
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable right out of the box. Seem durable so far. Very breathable shoe, plenty of arch support, and great traction on the sole. Stylish enough to be worn as a street walking shoe, and durable enough for hikes. They run a bit small, so I ordered 1/2 size larger than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Good for casual/ fishing
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the hubs ... I thought he should try a different style bc he only wears the chameleons..he wasn’t crazy about them so he wears them in the river fishing and they work well for that because they dry out really quickly
customer_reviews.author: mermaids

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and easy to put on. I like the ties, because I can make them as tight as I want. It's like not even wearing shoes. They're that comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy seeing how these are over $100 normally super comfortable I wear them at work on my feet all day over 12hr a day with a partial prosthetic and metal in both feet !
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: Merrill’s are great
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a little less light green but otherwise Awesome. May have got the pair without laces because they are not needed but that is a matter of taste.
customer_reviews.author: Harold R Norman II

customer_reviews.title: Close to perfect.
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable shoes ive ever worn. After near daily use for 7 months they are just now starting to get some separation on on the sole and one shoe has a small tare in the top fabric. Taking away one star for the separating but all in all they seem to hold up fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Merrell quality
customer_reviews.text: Merrell quality as always, definitely a summer shoe only very breathable
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: 6'8" former basketball champion says "most comfortable shoe he has ever had!!!"
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous cushion and comfort; so comfortable for big 6'8" former basketball champion who is now a chef and is on his feet 8-9 hours a day loves these shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Merrel life.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing light weight shoes will but again in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: PowerflowerSTL

customer_reviews.title: ran small
customer_reviews.text: nice looking but ran at least one full size smaller than expected
customer_reviews.author: A. Brust

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great all around shoe! I got them for a month long trip to east Africa and they're probably my favorite pair of shoes. They can be worn anywhere: even hiking mt kilimanjaro!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good-looking and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks and feels great. Easy to put on and lace off. I get lots of compliments. Almost everyone says when I say it is a Merrell - "really"? I like that.
customer_reviews.author: groho

customer_reviews.title: Easy slip-on, comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love This slip on Merrill Sneaker, it’s exactly what I was looking for a quick and easy way to slip on a comfortable pair of walking shoes/sneakers, they are comfortable lightweight and stylish, five stars for me.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Buttram

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy, Consider a 1/2 size up!
customer_reviews.text: Tiny bit smaller than I anticipated, but I’ve been so used to Keens with the big toe box! Great looking shoe that I’ve gotten many compliments on! Very comfy as well!
customer_reviews.author: Geoff M

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp looking for a hiking shoe, however after a few wears I realized they are too narrow, making the shaped footbed very uncomfortable. My feet are normal width.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren DeLoach

customer_reviews.title: If your feet are only 3 toes wide this is your shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe sizes run very small and narrow. The shoe isnt padded and probably wouldn't make for a good walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Edison Detroit

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, fit great, super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for Christmas 2019 and he LOVES them. He says they fit perfect (he wears a size 11) and that the stretchy top is incredibly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Brand of Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect and the most comfortable shoe. This is my second pair of Merrell shoes and I'll definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great for high arches
customer_reviews.text: Great Shoes! Great for high arches with a soft top. Plenty of support with medium sole.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t listen to the naysayers!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! They’re the sock you’ve always wanted! These aren’t boots they’re more of a trainer shoe and well designed!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Bass

product_meta.title: Merrell Men's Range Ac+ Trainers
product_meta.description: Do whatever, whenever in range arc+. designed with easy-fitting 3-d stretch knit, Merrell air cushion+ heel-to-toe comfort, and an m select grip outsole for added traction. 3D knit upper synthetic microfiber lining Traditional alce closure heel pull tab for ease of entry removable vivaform footbed Merrell air cushion+ heel to toe comfort in this air-ride system with strategically placed lugs for the ultimate lightweight cushion eva midsole for stability and comfort Merrell oil skid rubber outsole.
feature_bullets: Traditional alce closure. Heel pull tab for ease of entry.
Removable Vivaform footbed. Merrell Air Cushion+ heel to toe comfort in this air-ride system with strategically placed lugs for the ultimate lightweight cushion.
EVA midsole for stability and comfort. Merrell Oil Skid rubber outsole.
